data.text:
Hi Strawberry!
Everyting ok?

No, I'm feeling sick
Can you spare some coins?

choice.text: choise2 gsdffds dsf dsfdfs fdsdsffd fdsfdsfsd

data.text:
Hi Cooky!
Why are you always angry?

My mom told me
I was a happy baby.

But then I had to go to
school and stuff.
Now I just want to smash things.

Hi pirate. Are you ready to
go on an adventure!?

No, I'm just collecting
those free coins that
are lying around here.

You know, there is more
to live then coins.

Climb my braches,
and discover what its all about.
I don't know, seems like a lot of work...

Sigh... The are also
coins in the branches.

Why didn't you tell me earlier
I'm on my way!
Goodmorning little child.
Hi, Are you...
Are you God?
Noooo, my child!
I am the man in the sky!

Every year, I bring present
to the children!
If they are good, that is.
Do you want to have a present?

choice.text:
I'm not a child, but sure,
I like presents!

No time old man, I'm here to
search for coins..

data.text: Good my child! Choose wisely
You asshole! How do you dare to insult me!
